block.l: var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("POST", "http://localhost:3001/api/robots/Scratch4D/devices/drone/commands/front", false); xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'); xhr.send('params='+speed.toString());

var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("POST", "http://localhost:3001/api/robots/Scratch4D/devices/drone/commands/back", false); xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'); xhr.send("params="+speed.toString());

var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("POST", "http://localhost:3001/api/robots/Scratch4D/devices/drone/commands/clockwise", false); xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'); xhr.send("params="+speed.toString());

var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("POST", "http://localhost:3001/api/robots/Scratch4D/devices/drone/commands/counter_clockwise", false); xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'); xhr.send("params="+speed.toString());

var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("POST", "http://localhost:3001/api/robots/Scratch4D/devices/drone/commands/left", false); xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'); xhr.send("params="+speed.toString());

var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("POST", "http://localhost:3001/api/robots/Scratch4D/devices/drone/commands/right", false); xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'); xhr.send("params="+speed.toString());

var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("POST", "http://localhost:3001/api/robots/Scratch4D/devices/drone/commands/down", false); xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'); xhr.send("params="+speed.toString());

var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("POST", "http://localhost:3001/api/robots/Scratch4D/devices/drone/commands/up", false); xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'); xhr.send("params="+speed.toString());

var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("POST", "http://localhost:3001/api/robots/Scratch4D/devices/drone/commands/config", false); xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'); xhr.send("params={key:" + key.toString()+ ", value:" + value.toString() + "}");
